local_intent: Verify grasp stability, lift the white plate by 0.1m (z), detect the red plate, move above and align for placement
assumptions: White plate currently held by the gripper after previous CloseGripper
Red plate remains visible/within reach of sensors after lift
Timing bins (timeout_ms, num_attempts, tolerance, distance) are appropriate for reliable execution
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer phase from the global plan: verifies grasp, executes the specified upward MoveDelta (z, 0.1m), then re-acquires the red plate and performs MoveAbove and ApproachAndAlign consistent with subsequent placement steps.
